## Lesson Plans
Think/pair/share (x2) on lesson plans
- What works? What doesn't?
- Peer review:
  - Comments, questions, 2 reflection Qs
  - Similarities and differences between this and your lesson plan
  - What you really liked and how you might incorporate later
- Peer review will be assigned on Canvas

## Assignment

Revise your lesson plan in response to the feedback you received as well. Incorporate ideas from other students you picked up during the discussion, if you like.
